zero-shot-prompt.naive: Please determine whether the image contains anomalies. If yes, give a specific reason.
zero-shot-prompt.with class_information: Please determine whether this X-ray image on the chest contains any anomalies. If yes, please give your reason.
zero-shot-prompt.with human expertise: Please determine whether this chest x-ray image contains any anomalies. If yes, please give your reason. The image given should be classified as normal or pneumonia.

one-shot-prompt.naive: The first image is normal. Please determine whether the second image contains anomalies. If yes, give a specific reason.
one-shot-prompt.with class_information: The first image of Chest X-ray is normal. Please determine whether the second image given contains anomalies. If yes, give a specific reason.
one-shot-prompt.with human expertise: The first image of Chest X-ray is normal. Please determine whether the second image given contains anomalies. If yes, give a specific reason. The image given should be classified as normal or pneumonia.
